EmailTemplate.name: External Newsletter.2019-03-28
EmailTemplate.subject: Don't Jump Into AI Without Doing Your Homework
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
March 28, 2019 <[[https://content.pivotal.io/intersect/dont-jump-into-ai-without-doing-your-homework?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Don't Jump Into AI Without Doing Your Homework Why getting up to speed on what AI actually means and doesn’t mean is the first step in implementing an AI strategy. Here's Why <[[https://content.pivotal.io/intersect/dont-jump-into-ai-without-doing-your-homework?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://www.cloudfoundry.org/blog/cloud-foundry-summit-is-where-you-learn-how-industrialized-open-source-leads-to-a-better-bottom-line/]]> Must-Attend Events at Cloud Foundry Summit 2019 Going to Cloud Foundry Summit next week in Philly? Here's a rundown of all the events you can't miss. Take A Closer Look <[[https://www.cloudfoundry.org/blog/cloud-foundry-summit-is-where-you-learn-how-industrialized-open-source-leads-to-a-better-bottom-line/]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/how-to-get-developers-to-start-using-your-application-platform?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> How to Get Developers to Start Using Your Application Platform “Platform as product” means learning product management and marketing. Read More <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/how-to-get-developers-to-start-using-your-application-platform?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://pivotal.io/intersect?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://www.enterprise-cio.com/news/2019/mar/21/how-instil-silicon-valley-style-culture-amplify-your-digital-transformation-efforts/]]> How to Use Culture to Amplify Your Digital Transformation Efforts Robbie Clutton, Head of Pivotal Labs EMEA, talks to Enterprise CIO on the importance of a strong software developer culture. It's About The People <[[https://www.enterprise-cio.com/news/2019/mar/21/how-instil-silicon-valley-style-culture-amplify-your-digital-transformation-efforts/]]> <[[https://www.cognizant.com/case-studies/digital-engineering-application-migration]]> A Pivotal Move Ensures Scalable Cloud Service for Communication and Services Provider Find out why West Corp turned to Pivotal and Cognizant to scale and increase the efficiency of their applications. Learn More <[[https://www.cognizant.com/case-studies/digital-engineering-application-migration]]> <[[https://www.smh.com.au/business/workplace/chance-for-technical-types-to-show-their-creative-side-20190325-p517gx.html]]> A Chance For Technical Types to Show Their Creative Side Lawrence Crowther, Field CTO of Pivotal in Asia-Pacific and Japan, talks to The Sydney Morning Herald about a career as an IT architect. Check it Out <[[https://www.smh.com.au/business/workplace/chance-for-technical-types-to-show-their-creative-side-20190325-p517gx.html]]> <https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/for-platform-teams-the-developers-are-the-customer-with-pivotals-paula-kennedy?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter> Why You Need a Dedicated Platform Team, with Pivotal's Paula Kennedy In this episode of Pivotal Conversations, Paula Kennedy, a member of Pivotal's PCF Solutions team, discusses best practices for platform teams to successfully adopt platform-as-product. Listen Now <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/for-platform-teams-the-developers-are-the-customer-with-pivotals-paula-kennedy?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Upcoming Events 4/02-4/04, Cloud Foundry Summit North America, Philadelphia <[[https://www.cloudfoundry.org/event/nasummit2019/]]>
4/08-4/09, SpringOne Tour, Johannesburg <[[https://springonetour.io/2019/johannesburg?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]>
4/09, Pivotal Days, Chicago <[[https://connect.pivotal.io/Pivotal-Days-Chicago.html?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]>
